name: Inter-Tidal Snail Breeder Deluxe
description:
Enter the Inter-Tidal Zone and Breed Snails!


Move the Snail with (W,A,S,D and Arrow Keys)

Collect Plants to Breed!

When the Tide rolls in, Hold Down (SPACE) to HOLD ON! (or not!)

Press R to reload the game(if you die!), and ESC to exit.

See what Color Snails you can Breed! How Long can you Survive??

(Snails have a short lifespan, and holding on for too long may be disastrous! Learn to Let Go!)



for Ludum Dare 38!

Special Thanks To:

Sam Loeschen

Anton Pantev
